purpose.p: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the representation of relationships between requirements which are expressed as relationships between requirement view definitions i.e. the relationships are dependent on the version of the requirement and the view of that version.

inscope.li: relationships between requirements that are expressed at the view definition level

uof.name: Requirement_Collection_Relationship
uof.description: The Requirement_collection_relationship UoF specifies the data type needed to represent the data that characterize relationships between requirement view definitions in a requirement collection.

uof.name: Tracing_Relationship
uof.description: The Tracing_relationship UoF specifies the data type needed to represent the data that characterize tracing relationships between requirement view definitions.
